data.text: @thehill @TheHillOpinion This article is riddled with inaccuracies - please publish actual experts and ASHRAE guidance instead of giving a platform to someone without the relevant experience!

@thehill @TheHillOpinion The Hill: "Seatbelts won't save the life of EVERY car accident victim and you are all foolish to even try. Why sacrifice travel comfort when the risk of individual death and injury are so low?"

@thehill @TheHillOpinion Nothing is 100% guaranteed...plus people might be allergic to alcohol.....so far....even people in other countries have done it & every single one is alive and no side effects at all.

If done right....it helps the immune system 🤧....that's all.

I'm living proof 

The Wise_One

@thehill @TheHillOpinion Very simple....and this is how I survived the virus...& family were asymptomatic, after I told them in 2020.

A few drops of alcohol....every 15~30mins by the intake of the HVAC.

I tried it as much as every 5 min & it works without side effects.

I'm living proof. 

The Wise_One
@thehill @TheHillOpinion Go get some frigin therapy, donks.
